sentences.english: The broken heteromorphic cells were found in the part of longitudinal split.

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of CT in the diagnosis and treatment of diastematomyelia .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討CT在脊髓縱裂畸形診斷和治療中的價值。

sentences.english: Grey biennial sticks, and that Arendt profiling fracture.

sentences.english: To explore clinical features of vertical root fracture (VRF) and analyze the possible causes of VRF.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察研究牙根縱裂的臨牀特徵，分析其發病原因。

sentences.english: In 2 cases with split cord malformation, spinal coal or dural sac were separated by bony or fibrous septum.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓縱裂2例，脊髓硬膜囊被骨性或纖維間隔分開。

sentences.english: Some longitudinal cracks on the surface of the continuous cast slab SS400 were detected.

sentences.english: Antheral introversion or extroversion , slit or aperture leave.

sentences.english: The spinal cord is damaged slightly in single-tube diastematomyelia and surgery is not indicated.
sentences.chinese: 單管型脊髓縱裂脊髓損害輕，不需手術探查。

sentences.english: Objective To study the pathogenic factors of vertical root fractures (VRFs).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析牙根縱裂的致病因素。

sentences.english: Objective To study the dinical effect of molar vertical crack.
